column6:
Knowing that their very survival may hinge on Ororo's ability to harness her newfound powers, T'Challa and Ororo travel deeper into the jungle, just a step ahead of the mercenaries that are hot on their trail. There, the sparks between the two teenagers finally ignite into fire, and their relationship takes on a whole new meaning. ,2006,5
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Eric Jerome Dickey | letterer:Randy Gentile | inker:Jay Leisten | penciller (cover):Mike Mayhew | colorist:Matt Milla | penciller:David Yardin
